Uses of Interface
biz.gabrys.maven.plugin.util.parameter.sanitizer.ValueSanitizer

  • Packages that use ValueSanitizer 
    Package Description
    biz.gabrys.maven.plugin.util.parameter
    Contains utilities to operate on Mojos and methods parameters.
    biz.gabrys.maven.plugin.util.parameter.sanitizer
    Contains sanitizers responsible for sanitizing (convert from invalid to valid form) Mojos parameters values.

    • Uses of ValueSanitizer in biz.gabrys.maven.plugin.util.parameter

    • Uses of ValueSanitizer in biz.gabrys.maven.plugin.util.parameter.sanitizer

      Classes in biz.gabrys.maven.plugin.util.parameter.sanitizer that implement ValueSanitizer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractSimpleSanitizer
      Helps in implementing sanitizers which specify that the parameter value is valid based on a simple condition.
      class  AlwaysValidSanitizer
      Value sanitizer which treats all values as valid.
      class  LazySimpleSanitizer
      Simple value sanitizer which returns a declared lazy loaded sanitized value when specified condition returns true.
      class  SimpleSanitizer
      Simple value sanitizer which returns a declared sanitized value when specified condition returns true.
